entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
